channel.title: Putting Youtube Videos On Your Ipod Or Psp
channel.description:
Have you ever wanted a video on your ipod but u cant afford one.
Hey!!! But now u can and heres how
Step 1: find a video on youtube and copy the link
Step 2: go to www.vixy.net and paste the link into the box
Step 3: at the drop-down box click on the mp4 for ipod/psp
Step 4: wait for it to convert then download it and drag it into your itunes library
happy converting :)

item.title: Putting Youtube Videos On Your Ipod Or Psp
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

No thanks, I’ll just use FFMpeg.

I made a small script to make it convert to iPod.

@echo off ffmpeg -y -maxfr 15 -i %1% -bitexact -vcodec h264 -coder 0 -bufsize 256 -g 250 -vlevel 13 -fixaspect -s 320x240 -b 192 -maxrate 768 -qmin 2 -qmax 51 -acodec aac -ac 2 -ar 48000 -ab 48 -f ipod out.m4v ren out.m4v %1%.m4v [br][size=1]Posted on: April 30, 2007, 03:46:40 PM[/size][hr]You’ll need these files, by the way.

[ul][li]cygwin1.dll[/li]
[li]cygz.dll[/li]
[li]ffmpeg.exe[/li][/ul]

That’s how I get my shows on my iPod.

Read full topic

off topic, but when you upload ur videos, convert them to flv format before uploading to youtube. Because after it goes into youtube, the “proccessing” mode is a lot faster, since they are in the correct format.

item.title: Putting Youtube Videos On Your Ipod Or Psp
item.dc:creator: @wazup2 wazup2
item.description:
@wazup2 wrote:

wen i try it i get [code] Connecting to the server…
URL:

Example(YouTube): http://youtube.com/watch?v=J7JmsMMIR4Y
Example(FLV file): http://vixy.net/flv/vixy_net_podcaster_demo_director.flv

Converts to: AVI for Windows (DivX + MP3) MOV for Mac (MPEG4 + MP3) MP4 for iPod/PSP (MPEG4 + AAC) 3GP for Mobile (MPEG4 + AAC) MP3 (audio only)
Converted Size: -/-KB

Source URL: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FLn45-7Pn2Y
Converting Format: .mp4
[/code] and it der forever…
